Text: I wanted to say thank you to all the uploaders who put comics here on the bay.Especially a thank you to downtown,mirror and gunninghawk for everything that they post.Im a father and money is tight so i greatly appreciate everything they upload because theres no way i can afford to buy every single comic that comes out.
You're very welcome - my thanks to the scanners and seeders :D
Thanks for the up.....love this series!
